text: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi bihemukiye, abamalayika babakuramo roho zabo bababwira bati “Mwari mu biki?” Bakabasubiza bati “Twari abanyantege nke tunatotezwa ku isi.” Hanyuma (abamalayika) bakababwira bati “Ese isi ya Allah ntiyari ngari ngo mwimukire ahandi?” Abo, ubuturo bwabo ni mu muriro wa Jahanamu kandi ni ryo herezo ribi
